dish_en_th: Pad Thai Goong Sod (ผัดไทยกุ้งสด)
dish_en: Pad Thai Goong Sod (Stir-Fried Thai Noodles with Fresh Shrimp)
dish_th: ผัดไทยกุ้งสด
description_en: Pad Thai Goong Sod is a classic Thai stir-fried noodle dish with fresh shrimp, tamarind sauce, tofu, egg, and crunchy bean sprouts. It offers a harmonious balance of sweet, sour, salty, and umami flavors.
description_zh: 泰式鲜虾炒河粉是一道经典泰国炒粉，搭配鲜虾、酸甜的罗望子酱、豆腐、鸡蛋和脆爽的豆芽，味道甜酸咸鲜，十分和谐美味。
ingredients_en: 120 g rice noodles (sen chan or small flat noodles)
ingredients_zh: 河粉 120 克（小宽粉或泰式河粉）
instructions_en: Step 1: In a small pan, simmer the fish sauce, palm sugar, and tamarind paste until well combined and slightly thickened.
Step 2: Soak rice noodles in water until soft, then drain.
Step 3: Heat oil in a large pan or wok. Stir-fry tofu, dried shrimp, minced garlic, shallots, and preserved radish until fragrant.
Step 4: Add the soaked noodles and prepared sauce. Stir-fry until the noodles absorb the sauce and are tender.
Step 5: Push noodles to one side, crack in the eggs, scramble lightly, then mix with noodles.
Step 6: Add bean sprouts and Chinese chives. Toss quickly and remove from heat.
Step 7: Serve hot, garnished with roasted peanuts, chili flakes, and lime wedges.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：小锅中煮鱼露、棕榈糖和罗望子酱，煮至融合稍微浓稠。
步骤2：将河粉浸泡至软，沥干备用。
步骤3：热锅加油，炒豆腐丁、虾米、蒜末、红葱末和咸萝卜碎，炒香。
步骤4：加入泡软的河粉和调好的酱汁，翻炒至粉条入味且软嫩。
步骤5：将粉推至一边，打入鸡蛋，炒至半熟后与粉拌匀。
步骤6：加入豆芽和韭菜段，快速翻炒几下即可出锅。
步骤7：装盘，搭配花生碎、辣椒粉和青柠角食用。
dietary_tags: Gluten Free Possible (with gluten-free fish sauce)
tags: pad thai, shrimp, noodles, tofu, thai street food, central, noodle dish

dish_en_th: Tom Yum Goong (ต้มยำกุ้ง)
dish_en: Tom Yum Goong (Spicy Thai Soup with Shrimp)
dish_th: ต้มยำกุ้ง
description_en: Tom Yum Goong is a famous Thai hot and sour soup with shrimp, lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, chili, and fresh herbs. It is known for its bold and refreshing flavors.
description_zh: 泰式冬阴功汤是一道著名的泰国酸辣虾汤，使用香茅、南姜、柠檬叶、辣椒和新鲜香草，风味浓郁清爽，令人回味无穷。
ingredients_en: 2 tablespoons chopped culantro or coriander leaves
1/4 cup coconut milk (optional for creamy style)
ingredients_zh: 香菜叶或香菜芫荽 2 汤匙
泰国小辣椒 8 个（捣碎）
椰奶 1/4 杯（可选，做浓汤）
instructions_en: Step 1: Bring water to a boil in a pot. Add lemongrass and galangal, simmer until fragrant.
Step 2: Add straw mushrooms and shrimp. Cook until shrimp turn pink.
Step 3: Season with fish sauce, crushed bird's eye chilies, torn kaffir lime leaves, chopped culantro, and lime juice.
Step 4: For creamy style, add coconut milk at this stage and stir well.
Step 5: Serve hot, garnished with fresh coriander leaves.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：锅中加水煮沸，加入香茅和南姜，煮至出香味。
步骤2：加入草菇和虾仁，煮至虾变粉红色。
步骤3：调味，加入鱼露、捣碎的小辣椒、撕开的柠檬叶、香菜叶和青柠汁。
步骤4：如需浓汤风味，可在此阶段加入椰奶，搅拌均匀。
步骤5：盛出热食，撒上新鲜香菜叶。
tags: tom yum, shrimp, hot and sour soup, central, soup, spicy

dish_en_th: Gaeng Kiew Wan Gai (แกงเขียวหวานไก่)
dish_en: Gaeng Kiew Wan Gai (Green Curry with Chicken)
dish_th: แกงเขียวหวานไก่
description_en: Green Curry Chicken is a rich and aromatic Thai curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, tender chicken, Thai eggplants, and fresh herbs. It is known for its creamy texture and slightly sweet and spicy flavor.
description_zh: 泰式绿咖喱鸡是一道香浓可口的泰国咖喱，使用绿咖喱酱、椰奶、嫩鸡肉、泰国茄子和新鲜香草，口感顺滑，味道微甜微辣，深受欢迎。
ingredients_zh: 泰国圆茄子 400 克（切块）
instructions_en: **To make Green Curry Paste:**
Step 1: Pound white peppercorns finely.
Step 2: Add chilies and salt, pound until smooth.
Step 3: Add galangal, lemongrass, kaffir lime peel, coriander root, and pound thoroughly.
Step 4: Add shallots, garlic, remaining ingredients, pound until well combined.
Step 5: Add shrimp paste and pound until smooth.
**To cook Green Curry:**
Step 1: Heat 200 g thick coconut milk over medium-high heat until oil separates.
Step 2: Add green curry paste and fry until aromatic. Gradually add remaining thick coconut milk while stirring until oil separates again.
Step 3: Add chicken pieces and torn kaffir lime leaves. Stir until chicken is cooked through.
Step 4: Add thin coconut milk. Season with fish sauce and brown sugar.
Step 5: When the curry is boiling, add Thai eggplants and pea eggplants. Stir well.
Step 6: Cover the pot and simmer until eggplants are cooked. Taste and adjust seasoning.
Step 7: Add sliced red chilies and sweet basil leaves. Turn off the heat. Serve hot.
instructions_zh: **绿咖喱酱制作方法：**
步骤1：将白胡椒粒捣碎。
步骤2：加入辣椒和盐，捣成细腻。
步骤3：加入南姜、香茅、青柠皮、香菜根，继续捣碎。
步骤4：加入红葱头、蒜头及剩余材料，捣至融合。
步骤5：加入虾酱，捣匀备用。
**绿咖喱烹饪方法：**
步骤1：中高火加热 200 克浓椰奶，煮至出油。
步骤2：加入绿咖喱酱，炒香，逐渐加入剩余浓椰奶，继续炒至出油。
步骤3：加入鸡肉块和柠檬叶，翻炒至鸡肉变熟。
步骤4：加入稀椰奶，调入鱼露和红糖。
步骤5：咖喱沸腾后，加入泰国圆茄和豌豆茄子，搅拌均匀。
步骤6：盖锅煮至茄子熟透，尝味调整。
步骤7：最后加入红辣椒片和甜罗勒叶，关火，趁热食用。
tags: green curry, chicken, coconut milk, thai curry, central, spicy

dish_en_th: Massaman Gai (มัสมั่นไก่)
dish_en: Massaman Gai (Thai Muslim-Style Curry with Chicken)
dish_th: มัสมั่นไก่
description_en: Massaman Chicken Curry is a rich, mildly spicy Thai curry with tender chicken, potatoes, onions, roasted peanuts, and a fragrant blend of spices and coconut milk. It reflects a unique blend of Thai and Persian culinary influences.
description_zh: 泰式马萨曼咖喱鸡是一道香浓微辣的泰国咖喱，使用嫩鸡肉、土豆、洋葱、烤花生和香料与椰奶慢炖，融合了泰国与波斯的独特风味。
ingredients_zh: 马萨曼咖喱酱 1–2 汤匙
instructions_en: Step 1: Heat oil in a pan. Add Massaman curry paste and stir-fry until fragrant.
Step 2: Gradually add coconut milk while stir-frying until oil separates.
Step 3: Add chicken and continue to stir-fry. Add more coconut milk and water to cover the chicken. Simmer over low heat with lid on for about 30 minutes.
Step 4: Season with fish sauce, salt, tamarind juice, and palm sugar. Adjust flavor to taste.
Step 5: Add roasted peanuts, potatoes, and onion. Simmer for another 10 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Step 6: Turn off heat and serve hot.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：锅中加油，加入马萨曼咖喱酱，炒香。
步骤2：逐渐加入椰奶，炒至出油。
步骤3：放入鸡肉继续翻炒，加入更多椰奶和清水，没过鸡肉，小火盖锅炖煮约 30 分钟。
步骤4：调味，加入鱼露、盐、罗望子汁和棕榈糖，按口味调整。
步骤5：加入烤花生、土豆和洋葱，继续炖煮 10 分钟，至食材软熟。
步骤6：关火，趁热食用。
tags: massaman curry, chicken, coconut milk, peanuts, thai curry, central, mild

dish_en_th: Khao Man Gai (ข้าวมันไก่)
dish_en: Khao Man Gai (Thai-Style Hainanese Chicken Rice)
dish_th: ข้าวมันไก่
description_en: Khao Man Gai is a Thai-style poached chicken with fragrant rice cooked in chicken broth, served with a savory dipping sauce, cucumber, and coriander. It is adapted from the Hainanese chicken rice and is beloved for its comforting flavors.
description_zh: 泰式鸡饭是一道用鸡汤煮香米饭，搭配白切鸡、特制蘸酱、黄瓜和香菜的美食，源自海南鸡饭，风味温润可口，深受喜爱。
ingredients_en: 1 tablespoon Knorr concentrated chicken-flavored sauce (or equivalent seasoning)
ingredients_zh: Knorr 浓缩鸡味酱 1 汤匙（或同类调味料）
instructions_en: Step 1: Turn on the rice cooker and wait until it heats up.
Step 2: Add cooking oil, followed by minced garlic and sliced ginger. Stir-fry until fragrant and golden.
Step 3: Add uncooked jasmine rice and 1 tablespoon of chicken-flavored sauce. Stir to coat the rice.
Step 4: Add water and place chicken thighs on top. Cook until rice and chicken are done.
Step 5: Slice the cooked chicken. Plate the rice and top with chicken slices.
Step 6: Serve with dipping sauce, sliced cucumber, and coriander leaves.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：打开电饭煲，等待加热。
步骤2：加入食用油，放入蒜末和姜片，炒香至金黄。
步骤3：加入生米和 1 汤匙鸡味酱，翻炒均匀。
步骤4：加入清水，将鸡腿放在米饭上，一起煮至米饭和鸡肉熟透。
步骤5：将鸡肉切片，米饭盛盘，鸡肉铺在饭上。
步骤6：搭配蘸酱、黄瓜片和香菜食用。
tags: khao man gai, chicken rice, poached chicken, central, rice dish, comfort food

dish_en_th: Khao Kha Moo (ข้าวขาหมู)
dish_en: Khao Kha Moo (Stewed Pork Leg on Rice)
dish_th: ข้าวขาหมู
description_en: Khao Kha Moo is a beloved Thai dish of braised pork leg served over steamed rice, accompanied by pickled vegetables, hard-boiled eggs, and blanched Chinese broccoli. The pork is simmered in a rich, aromatic broth until tender.
description_zh: 泰式卤猪脚饭是一道深受欢迎的泰国美食，卤煮至酥烂的猪脚配上米饭，搭配腌菜、卤蛋和烫青菜，汤汁浓郁香醇，入口即化。
ingredients_en: 3 tablespoons pounded mixture of peppercorns, garlic, and coriander roots
ingredients_zh: 白胡椒粒、蒜头、香菜根捣碎 3 汤匙
instructions_en: Step 1: Heat a pan over high heat, add a little oil. Sear the pork leg skin side down until tightened and golden. Flip and sear the other side. Transfer to a braising pot.

Step 2: In the same pan, sauté the pounded garlic, peppercorns, and coriander roots until fragrant. Add palm sugar and cook until caramelized and dark. Add fish sauce, seasoning sauce, and sweet dark soy sauce. Turn off heat and pour into the pot with pork.
Step 3: Add hard-boiled eggs, soaked shiitake mushrooms, star anise, and cinnamon sticks to the pot.
Step 4: Pour in enough water to cover the pork. Simmer gently until boiling. Skim off scum and continue simmering until pork is tender.
Step 5: When ready to serve, remove eggs, slice the pork leg into pieces. Blanch Chinese broccoli in the broth until bright green.
Step 6: Serve sliced pork leg over rice with egg, blanched Chinese broccoli, and broth as desired.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：大火热锅，少许油，将猪脚皮朝下煎至紧实上色，翻面煎另一面，取出放入卤锅。
步骤2：同锅放入捣碎的蒜头、白胡椒粒、香菜根炒香，加入椰糖炒至焦糖色，倒入鱼露、调味酱油、甜酱油，关火后倒入卤锅。
步骤3：锅中加入卤蛋、泡软香菇、八角和桂皮。
步骤4：加水没过猪脚，小火煮沸，撇去浮沫，慢炖至猪脚酥烂。
步骤5：食用前取出卤蛋，猪脚切片，芥蓝菜焯水至翠绿。
步骤6：装盘，猪脚铺饭上，配卤蛋、芥蓝菜和卤汁即可食用。
tags: khao kha moo, braised pork leg, pork, rice dish, central, comfort food

dish_en_th: Khao Moo Daeng (ข้าวหมูแดง)
dish_en: Khao Moo Daeng (Thai Red Pork with Rice)
dish_th: ข้าวหมูแดง
description_en: Khao Moo Daeng is a popular Thai dish featuring sliced red barbecued pork served over rice, topped with a sweet-savory gravy. It is often accompanied by hard-boiled eggs, cucumber slices, and fresh coriander.
description_zh: 泰式红烧叉烧饭是一道受欢迎的泰国美食，叉烧肉片铺在米饭上，淋上甜咸适中的酱汁，通常搭配卤蛋、黄瓜片和香菜，风味十足。
ingredients_en: 500 g pork shoulder or pork neck
3 tablespoons Lobo red pork seasoning powder
2–3 tablespoons palm sugar or coconut sugar
1 tablespoon 'sam kler' (pounded garlic, coriander root, peppercorns)
5 tablespoons palm sugar or coconut sugar
ingredients_zh: 猪肩肉或猪颈肉 500 克
Lobo 叉烧调料粉 3 汤匙
椰糖或棕榈糖 2–3 汤匙
三宝料（蒜头、香菜根、白胡椒粒捣碎）1 汤匙
椰糖或棕榈糖 5 汤匙
instructions_en: Step 1: Cut pork into 3–4 cm thick pieces. Marinate with all red pork ingredients. Refrigerate for 2–4 hours.
Step 2: Roast pork at 150°C for 15 minutes. Flip and roast another 10 minutes. (If using air fryer or convection oven, extend time by 5–10 minutes depending on heat.)
Step 3: If no oven is available, simmer pork in water until the water reduces and pork is cooked (monitor closely).
Step 4: In a pot, combine water, Lobo gravy powder, sugar, and salt. Simmer until dissolved. Add cornstarch slurry and simmer 3–5 minutes until desired thickness.
Step 5: Slice pork and serve over steamed rice with gravy, hard-boiled eggs, cucumber slices, and coriander.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：猪肉切成 3–4 厘米厚块，用所有叉烧腌料腌制，冷藏 2–4 小时。
步骤2：烤箱 150°C 烤 15 分钟，翻面再烤 10 分钟。（空气炸锅或热风炉需延长 5–10 分钟，根据温度调整。）
步骤3：若无烤箱，可将猪肉放入锅中加水煮至水干，肉熟透（需勤看）。
步骤4：锅中放入水、Lobo 酱料粉、糖、盐，煮至溶化，加入淀粉水，继续煮 3–5 分钟至浓稠。
步骤5：将叉烧切片，铺在米饭上，淋上酱汁，搭配卤蛋、黄瓜片和香菜食用。
tags: khao moo daeng, red pork, barbecue pork, rice dish, central, street food, comfort food

dish_en_th: Kuai Tiao Ruea (ก๋วยเตี๋ยวเรือ)
dish_en: Kuai Tiao Ruea (Thai Boat Noodles)
dish_th: ก๋วยเตี๋ยวเรือ
description_en: Kuai Tiao Ruea, or Thai boat noodles, is a deeply flavorful noodle soup featuring pork, pork liver, pork blood, and herbs in a rich, dark broth. It is typically served with bean sprouts, morning glory, fried pork cracklings, and fresh herbs.
description_zh: 泰式船面是一种风味浓郁的泰国米粉汤，汤底由猪肉、猪肝、猪血和香料慢炖而成，搭配豆芽、空心菜、炸猪油渣和新鲜香草，风味独特。
ingredients_en: 700 g pork fat (for making pork cracklings)
ingredients_zh: 猪油 700 克（制作猪油渣）
instructions_en: Step 1: Bring water to boil with pork bones, pork spare ribs, spice packets, pandan leaves, daikon, coriander roots, celery roots, crushed garlic, onion, and galangal. Season with salt, light soy sauce, green cap soy sauce, palm sugar, and Knorr cube. Simmer until pork is tender.
Step 2: Prepare sliced pork and liver for blanching.
Step 3: Render pork fat to make crispy pork cracklings. Fry minced garlic in the rendered fat until golden. Set aside.
Step 4: Once bones are tender, add pickled garlic juice and mashed fermented bean curd to the broth. Lower heat and add coconut milk.
Step 5: Blanch noodles, arrange in bowls. Blanch pork slices, liver, and meatballs in broth.
Step 6: Assemble noodles with meats and pour broth over. Top with pork cracklings, garlic, vegetables, and desired condiments (vinegar chili, chili flakes, soy sauce). Serve hot.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：大锅煮水，加入猪骨、猪小排、卤料包、香兰叶、白萝卜、香菜根、芹菜根、蒜瓣、洋葱和南姜，调入盐、生抽、绿色盖酱油、椰糖和 Knorr 调味块，小火炖煮至猪骨软烂。
步骤2：猪肉片和猪肝片准备好备用，待焯水。
步骤3：炼猪油制作油渣，蒜末用猪油炸至金黄，备用。
步骤4：骨头炖软后，加入泡蒜水和捣碎的红腐乳调味，转小火，加入椰奶。
步骤5：米粉烫熟放入碗中，猪肉片、猪肝片、猪肉丸用汤焯熟。
步骤6：将肉料铺在米粉上，淋上浓汤，撒上油渣、蒜酥、蔬菜和喜好调味料（酸辣椒、辣椒粉、酱油），趁热食用。
tags: kuai tiao ruea, boat noodles, pork noodles, blood soup, noodle dish, central, street food

dish_en_th: Kuai Tiao Tom Yum (ก๋วยเตี๋ยวต้มยำ)
dish_en: Kuai Tiao Tom Yum (Thai Tom Yum Noodles)
dish_th: ก๋วยเตี๋ยวต้มยำ
dish_zh: 泰式冬阴面 (Kuai Tiao Tom Yum)
description_en: Kuai Tiao Tom Yum is a flavorful Thai noodle soup featuring spicy and tangy Tom Yum broth, rice noodles, pork, minced pork, meatballs, bean sprouts, herbs, and crispy toppings.
description_zh: 泰式冬阴面是一道风味浓郁的泰国米粉汤，酸辣开胃，搭配猪肉、肉末、肉丸、豆芽、新鲜香草和酥脆配料，深受喜爱。
instructions_en: Step 1: Prepare the broth by simmering pork bones, coriander roots, daikon radish, garlic, pepper, salt, rock sugar, soy sauce, and onion for about 1 hour 30 minutes.
Step 2: Blanch noodles until tender. Blanch meatballs and bean sprouts, then arrange in serving bowls.
Step 3: In a separate bowl, mix Tom Yum chili paste, fish sauce, sugar, lime juice, ground peanuts, pickled mustard green, fried garlic, and minced pork with a little broth.
Step 4: Pour the seasoned Tom Yum broth over the noodles and toppings. Garnish with coriander, spring onions, and fried garlic. Serve hot.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：将猪骨、香菜根、白萝卜、大蒜、胡椒、盐、冰糖、生抽和洋葱一起炖煮约1小时30分钟，制成高汤。
步骤2：将米粉焯水煮熟，肉丸和豆芽焯水，放入碗中备用。
步骤3：在碗中混合冬阴酱、鱼露、糖、青柠汁、花生碎、咸菜丝、炸蒜末和猪肉末，加入少量高汤搅拌均匀。
步骤4：将调好的冬阴汤倒入米粉碗中，撒上香菜、葱花和炸蒜末，趁热食用。
tags: kuai tiao tom yum, tom yum noodles, spicy noodles, noodle dish, central, street food

dish_en_th: Kanom Jeen Gaeng Khiao Wan (ขนมจีนแกงเขียวหวาน)
dish_en: Kanom Jeen Gaeng Khiao Wan (Thai Rice Noodles with Green Curry Chicken)
dish_th: ขนมจีนแกงเขียวหวาน
dish_zh: 泰式米粉配绿咖喱鸡 (Kanom Jeen Gaeng Khiao Wan)
description_en: Kanom Jeen Gaeng Khiao Wan is a traditional Thai dish featuring fresh rice noodles served with rich and aromatic green curry made with chicken, Thai eggplants, pea eggplants, coconut milk, and fragrant herbs.
description_zh: 泰式米粉配绿咖喱鸡是一道经典泰国美食，新鲜米粉搭配浓郁香滑的绿咖喱鸡，加入泰国茄子、豌豆茄子、椰奶和芳香香草，口感丰富。
ingredients_en: Water 1 liter with 10 grams salt (for soaking eggplants)
Fresh rice noodles (Khanom Jeen), store-bought (for serving)
ingredients_zh: 鸡胸肉或鸡腿肉 350 克
1 升水 + 10 克盐（浸泡茄子）
泰式米粉（市场购买，用于搭配）
instructions_en: Step 1: Slice chilies and soak chopped eggplants in salted water.
Step 2: Slice chicken breast or thigh against the grain.
Step 3: Heat thick coconut milk over high heat until oil separates. Stir in green curry paste.
Step 4: Add chicken and stir-fry until partially cooked.
Step 5: Add thin coconut milk and bring to a boil.
Step 6: Add eggplants and simmer until tender. Then add pea eggplants, seasonings, and kaffir lime leaves.
Step 7: Finish with sweet basil leaves and sliced chilies.
Step 8: Serve green curry with steamed rice or fresh rice noodles (Khanom Jeen), store-bought.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：红辣椒切片，茄子切块后用盐水浸泡。
步骤2：鸡肉切片（逆纹切）。
步骤3：高火加热浓椰奶至出油，炒入绿咖喱酱。
步骤4：加入鸡肉炒至半熟。
步骤5：倒入淡椰奶煮沸。
步骤6：加入茄子煮至软烂，放入豌豆茄子、调味料和青柠叶。
步骤7：最后加入九层塔和红辣椒片。
步骤8：搭配米饭或泰式米粉（市场购买）食用。
tags: kanom jeen gaeng khiao wan, green curry, rice noodles, chicken curry, central, noodle dish

dish_en_th: Tod Mun Goong (ทอดมันกุ้ง)
dish_en: Tod Mun Goong (Thai Deep-Fried Shrimp Cakes)
dish_th: ทอดมันกุ้ง
description_en: Tod Mun Goong is a popular Thai appetizer made from minced shrimp mixed with pork fat and seasonings, formed into patties, and deep-fried to golden perfection. Served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce.
description_zh: 泰式炸虾饼是一道受欢迎的泰国开胃菜，将剁碎的虾肉与猪油和调料混合成饼，炸至金黄酥脆，搭配酸甜酱食用，外酥里嫩。
ingredients_en: Rice bran oil 2 teaspoons + for frying
Sweet and sour dipping sauce (for serving)
ingredients_zh: 米糠油 2 茶匙 + 用于炸
泰式三味蘸酱（搭配食用）
instructions_en: Step 1: Coarsely chop shrimp and firm pork fat. Place in a mixing bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and chill for 1 hour.
Step 2: Pound garlic, coriander roots, white pepper, and salt into a fine paste.
Step 3: Mix the pounded paste into the shrimp mixture along with soy sauce, sugar, crispy flour, and rice bran oil. Stir well, then add chopped coriander.
Step 4: Divide the mixture into 10 equal portions.
Step 5: Heat oil to 160°C. Fry the shrimp cakes in batches until golden and cooked through.
Step 6: Serve hot with sweet and sour dipping sauce.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：虾肉和猪板油粗切，放入碗中，盖上保鲜膜，冷藏1小时。
步骤2：将蒜、香菜根、白胡椒和盐捣成细泥。
步骤3：将捣好的香料泥加入虾肉混合物中，加入生抽、糖、炸粉和米糠油搅拌均匀，最后加入香菜末。
步骤4：将混合物分成10等份。
步骤5：油加热至160°C，分批炸虾饼，炸至金黄酥脆。
步骤6：趁热搭配泰式三味蘸酱食用。
tags: tod mun goong, shrimp cakes, fried shrimp, appetizer, central, street food

dish_en_th: Khao Pad Poo (ข้าวผัดปู)
dish_en: Khao Pad Poo (Thai Crab Fried Rice)
dish_th: ข้าวผัดปู
dish_zh: 泰式蟹肉炒饭 (Khao Pad Poo)
description_en: Khao Pad Poo is a simple yet delicious Thai fried rice dish made with fragrant jasmine rice, fresh crab meat, eggs, and savory seasonings. It is typically served with cucumber slices, lime wedges, and coriander.
description_zh: 泰式蟹肉炒饭是一道简单却美味的泰国炒饭，用香米、鲜蟹肉、鸡蛋和调味料炒制，通常搭配黄瓜片、青柠角和香菜享用。
instructions_en: Step 1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté chopped garlic until fragrant.
Step 2: Crack in eggs and lightly scramble until just set.
Step 3: Add cooked rice and season with oyster sauce, light soy sauce, sweet dark soy sauce, and a pinch of sugar. Stir-fry to combine.
Step 4: Add crab meat and gently stir to mix, being careful not to break up the crab too much.
Step 5: Add chopped spring onions and mix well.
Step 6: Serve with lime wedges, cucumber slices, and optionally garnish with coriander.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：中火热锅，加油，炒香蒜末。
步骤2：打入鸡蛋，稍微炒散。
步骤3：加入熟米饭，调入蚝油、生抽、甜酱油和糖，翻炒均匀。
步骤4：放入蟹肉，轻轻翻炒，不要炒碎蟹肉。
步骤5：加入葱花，翻炒均匀。
步骤6：搭配青柠、黄瓜片上桌，可选撒上香菜。
tags: khao pad poo, crab fried rice, seafood fried rice, rice dish, central, thai dish

dish_en_th: Por Pia Tod (ปอเปี๊ยะทอด)
dish_en: Por Pia Tod (Thai Deep-Fried Spring Rolls)
dish_th: ปอเปี๊ยะทอด
description_en: Por Pia Tod are Thai deep-fried spring rolls filled with minced pork, shrimp, glass noodles, vegetables, and aromatic herbs. They are served crispy hot with sweet chili dipping sauce.
description_zh: 泰式炸春卷是用猪肉末、虾末、粉丝、蔬菜和香料包裹成卷，炸至金黄酥脆，搭配泰式甜辣酱享用，香脆可口。
ingredients_zh: 食用油 2 汤匙（炒料用）
instructions_en: Step 1: Soak wood ear mushrooms and glass noodles. Slice mushrooms, cut noodles into short lengths. Prepare other vegetables.
Step 2: Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and coriander roots until fragrant. Add minced pork and shrimp, stir-fry until cooked.
Step 3: Add mushrooms, carrot, noodles, season with sugar, oyster sauce, soy sauce, white pepper. Stir-fry to combine.
Step 4: Add bean sprouts, stir briefly, then transfer mixture to a bowl to cool.
Step 5: Wrap filling tightly in spring roll wrappers.
Step 6: Heat oil to medium. Deep-fry spring rolls until golden and crispy. Drain on paper towels.
Step 7: Serve hot with sweet chili dipping sauce.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：黑木耳、粉丝泡软，黑木耳切丝，粉丝剪段，备好其他蔬菜。
步骤2：热锅加油，炒香蒜末和香菜根末，加入猪肉末和虾末炒熟。
步骤3：加入黑木耳丝、胡萝卜丝、粉丝，调入糖、蚝油、生抽、白胡椒粉，翻炒均匀。
步骤4：加入豆芽稍炒，盛出放凉。
步骤5：用春卷皮包入馅料，卷紧。
步骤6：中火热油，炸春卷至金黄酥脆，捞出沥油。
步骤7：搭配泰式甜辣酱趁热食用。
tags: por pia tod, thai spring rolls, fried spring rolls, appetizer, central, thai dish

dish_en_th: Pla Kapong Tod Nam Pla (ปลากะพงทอดน้ำปลา)
dish_en: Pla Kapong Tod Nam Pla (Thai Deep-Fried Sea Bass with Fish Sauce)
dish_th: ปลากะพงทอดน้ำปลา
dish_zh: 泰式炸鲈鱼配鱼露酱 (Pla Kapong Tod Nam Pla)
description_en: Pla Kapong Tod Nam Pla is a popular Thai seafood dish featuring deep-fried sea bass glazed with a savory and slightly sweet fish sauce mixture. It is typically served crispy hot with a fish sauce-based dipping sauce.
description_zh: 泰式炸鲈鱼配鱼露酱是一道受欢迎的泰国海鲜菜，炸鲈鱼淋上咸甜适口的鱼露酱，外酥里嫩，搭配鱼露蘸酱趁热食用风味最佳。
ingredients_en: Oyster sauce 2 tablespoons (for fish sauce glaze)
Palm sugar 1 tablespoon (for fish sauce glaze)
Fish sauce 2 tablespoons (for fish sauce glaze)
ingredients_zh: 食用油 2 升（用于炸鱼）
蚝油 2 汤匙（用于鱼露酱）
椰糖 1 汤匙（用于鱼露酱）
鱼露 2 汤匙（用于鱼露酱）
instructions_en: Step 1: Clean and scale the sea bass. Make diagonal cuts on both sides. Rub lightly with salt and pat dry.
Step 2: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Deep-fry the fish until golden and crispy on both sides (about 8–10 minutes per side). Drain and set aside.
Step 3: For the glaze, heat 2 tablespoons of the used frying oil in a pan. Add fish sauce, palm sugar, and oyster sauce. Stir until the sugar dissolves and the mixture boils.
Step 4: Pour the glaze evenly over the fried sea bass.
Step 5: Serve hot with fish sauce dipping sauce on the side.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：清洗鲈鱼，去鳞，鱼身两侧打斜刀，撒盐稍腌，擦干水分。
步骤2：锅中加油中火烧热，将鲈鱼炸至两面金黄酥脆（每面约8-10分钟），捞出沥油备用。
步骤3：用锅中炸鱼的油 2 汤匙，加鱼露、椰糖、蚝油煮沸，搅拌至糖融化。
步骤4：将酱汁均匀淋在炸好的鲈鱼上。
步骤5：搭配鱼露蘸酱趁热食用。
tags: pla kapong tod nam pla, deep-fried sea bass, thai seafood, fish sauce glaze, central, seafood dish

dish_en_th: Khao Kluk Kapi (ข้าวคลุกกะปิ)
dish_en: Khao Kluk Kapi (Thai Shrimp Paste Fried Rice)
dish_th: ข้าวคลุกกะปิ
dish_zh: 泰式虾酱炒饭 (Khao Kluk Kapi)
description_en: Khao Kluk Kapi is a traditional Thai fried rice dish seasoned with shrimp paste and served with a variety of flavorful accompaniments such as sweet pork, fried shrimp, shredded omelet, vegetables, and fresh herbs.
description_zh: 泰式虾酱炒饭是一道传统泰国炒饭，使用虾酱调味，搭配甜猪肉、炸虾米、蛋丝、蔬菜和香草等多样配料，风味丰富。
ingredients_en: Accompaniments: sweet pork, fried dried shrimp, shredded omelet, shredded long beans, shredded green mango, sliced shallots, sliced bird’s eye chili, lime wedges
ingredients_zh: 配料：甜猪肉、炸虾米、鸡蛋丝、豆角丝、青芒果丝、洋葱丝、辣椒圈、青柠块
instructions_en: Step 1: Prepare sweet pork by stir-frying shallots in oil until fragrant. Add pork, season with fish sauce, sugar, and dark soy sauce. Simmer until glossy.
Step 2: Pound shrimp paste and garlic until fine. Add ground dried shrimp and pound to combine.
Step 3: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Stir-fry the pounded mixture until fragrant. Add sugar and water, stir to combine.
Step 4: Increase heat, add cooked rice, and stir-fry until evenly mixed.
Step 5: Serve the shrimp paste fried rice with accompaniments on the side.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：制作甜猪肉，锅中炒香洋葱，加入猪肉，调入鱼露、糖和老抽，小火煮至亮泽。
步骤2：将虾酱和蒜捣成细泥，加入虾米粉继续捣匀。
步骤3：中火热锅加油，炒香捣好的酱料，加入糖和水，翻炒均匀。
步骤4：转大火，加入熟米饭，翻炒均匀入味。
步骤5：将炒饭盛出，搭配各种配料一起食用。
tags: khao kluk kapi, shrimp paste fried rice, thai fried rice, traditional thai dish, rice dish, central

dish_en_th: Suki Haeng (สุกี้แห้ง)
dish_en: Suki Haeng (Thai Stir-Fried Suki)
dish_th: สุกี้แห้ง
description_en: Suki Haeng is a Thai-style stir-fried sukiyaki dish featuring glass noodles, sliced chicken, vegetables, egg, and a flavorful Thai sukiyaki sauce. It is a popular street food with a rich umami flavor.
description_zh: 泰式干捞寿喜锅是一道泰国风味炒寿喜锅，配料有粉丝、鸡肉片、蔬菜、鸡蛋及泰式寿喜酱，街头小吃中非常受欢迎，风味浓郁。
ingredients_zh: 去皮鸡胸肉切片 80 克
instructions_en: Step 1: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté chopped garlic until fragrant.
Step 2: Add sliced chicken and stir-fry until nearly cooked. Add egg and scramble.
Step 3: Increase heat and add vegetables. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender.
Step 4: Add glass noodles, season with light soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Step 5: Add Thai sukiyaki sauce and stir everything together. Remove from heat.
Step 6: Serve with extra Thai sukiyaki dipping sauce.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：锅中加油，炒香蒜末。
步骤2：加入鸡肉片翻炒至半熟，打入鸡蛋炒散。
步骤3：转大火，加入蔬菜炒熟。
步骤4：加入粉丝，调入生抽和蚝油炒匀。
步骤5：倒入泰式寿喜酱，翻炒均匀，关火。
步骤6：搭配泰式寿喜酱蘸食。
tags: suki haeng, thai stir-fried suki, glass noodles, thai street food, noodle dish, central

dish_en_th: Moo Satay (หมูสะเต๊ะ)
dish_en: Moo Satay (Thai Grilled Pork Skewers with Peanut Sauce)
dish_th: หมูสะเต๊ะ
description_en: Moo Satay is a popular Thai street food dish consisting of grilled marinated pork skewers served with rich and creamy peanut sauce and a refreshing pickled cucumber relish (ajad).
description_zh: 泰式猪肉沙爹是受欢迎的泰国街头美食，腌制猪肉串烤至香嫩，搭配浓郁花生酱和爽口酸甜泡菜（阿渣）一起享用。
ingredients_en: Satay basting mixture: evaporated milk 30 grams + coconut milk 1 cup
ingredients_zh: 刷酱混合液：淡奶 30 克 + 椰奶 1 杯
instructions_en: Step 1: Pound coriander seeds, lemongrass, galangal, turmeric powder, curry powder, cumin, and white pepper to a fine paste.
Step 2: Mix sliced pork with spice paste, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, sugar, and salt. Marinate in the fridge for 2–3 hours.
Step 3: Mix coconut milk and evaporated milk for basting.
Step 4: Skewer the marinated pork and grill, basting occasionally with the coconut milk mixture until cooked.
Step 5: For peanut sauce: cook coconut milk, curry pastes, and evaporated milk. Add palm sugar, tamarind juice, salt, and ground peanuts. Simmer until thick.
Step 6: For ajad: boil water, sugar, salt, and vinegar. Cool, then add cucumber, coriander, chili, and shallots.
Step 7: Serve grilled pork satay with peanut sauce and ajad.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：将香菜籽、香茅、南姜、姜黄粉、咖喱粉、孜然粉、白胡椒粉捣成细泥。
步骤2：将猪肉片与香料泥、炼乳、淡奶、糖、盐拌匀，冷藏腌制 2-3 小时。
步骤3：混合椰奶和淡奶做刷酱。
步骤4：将腌好的猪肉串好，烤制过程中不断刷酱，烤至熟。
步骤5：制作花生酱：将椰奶、咖喱酱和淡奶煮沸，加入椰糖、罗望子汁、盐、花生碎，慢煮至浓稠。
步骤6：制作阿渣：水、糖、盐、醋煮沸冷却，加入黄瓜片、香菜、辣椒和洋葱。
步骤7：将猪肉沙爹搭配花生酱和阿渣一起享用。
tags: moo satay, thai pork satay, grilled skewers, peanut sauce, street food, central

dish_en_th: Kai Jiew Moo Sap (ไข่เจียวหมูสับ)
dish_en: Kai Jiew Moo Sap (Thai Minced Pork Omelet)
dish_th: ไข่เจียวหมูสับ
dish_zh: 泰式猪肉末煎蛋 (Kai Jiew Moo Sap)
description_en: Kai Jiew Moo Sap is a popular Thai comfort food dish featuring a fluffy and crispy omelet filled with seasoned minced pork. It is typically served over steamed rice.
description_zh: 泰式猪肉末煎蛋是一道深受喜爱的泰国家常菜，蛋皮酥脆，内含调味猪肉末，通常搭配米饭食用，简单美味。
instructions_en: Step 1: Crack eggs into a bowl and beat until combined. Add fish sauce, light soy sauce, and minced pork. Whisk until fluffy.
Step 2: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 3: Pour the egg mixture into the pan in a circular motion. Let it cook until golden on one side.
Step 4: Carefully flip the omelet to cook the other side until done.
Step 5: Increase heat briefly to crisp up the omelet and drain excess oil.
Step 6: Remove and drain on paper towels. Garnish with coriander and serve with steamed rice.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：鸡蛋打入碗中搅匀，加入鱼露、生抽和猪肉末，打发至蓬松。
步骤2：中火热锅倒入适量油。
步骤3：将蛋液倒入锅中，绕圈倒入，煎至一面金黄。
步骤4：小心翻面，煎至另一面熟透。
步骤5：最后调高火力，让煎蛋表面酥脆，沥油。
步骤6：盛出沥干油，撒上香菜，搭配米饭食用。
tags: kai jiew moo sap, minced pork omelet, thai omelet, comfort food, egg dish, central

dish_en_th: Pad See Ew (ผัดซีอิ๊ว)
dish_en: Pad See Ew (Thai Stir-Fried Rice Noodles with Soy Sauce)
dish_th: ผัดซีอิ๊ว
dish_zh: 泰式酱油炒河粉 (Pad See Ew)
description_en: Pad See Ew is a popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with wide rice noodles, pork, Chinese broccoli, egg, and a flavorful mix of light and dark soy sauces. It's loved for its savory, slightly sweet flavor and signature wok-seared noodles.
description_zh: 泰国著名街头美食，采用宽米粉搭配猪肉、芥蓝、鸡蛋以及酱油炒制，口感咸香微甜，锅气十足，深受游客和当地人喜爱。
instructions_en: Step 1: Slice pork and marinate with baking powder, pepper, and a little light soy sauce. Slice Chinese broccoli.
Step 2: Heat a wok with a little oil. Fry chopped garlic until fragrant. Increase heat and add pork slices. Stir-fry until cooked.
Step 3: Season with dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, and light soy sauce. Add wide rice noodles and stir-fry.
Step 4: Push ingredients to one side. Crack in an egg and lightly scramble. Cover with noodles and add Chinese broccoli. Stir-fry until everything is well cooked and slightly charred.
Step 5: Serve hot with vinegar chili, chili flakes, fish sauce, and sugar as condiments.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：将猪肉切片，用泡打粉、胡椒粉和少许生抽腌制。芥蓝切段备用。
步骤2：锅中加少量油，炒香蒜末。转大火，加入猪肉片炒熟。
步骤3：调入老抽、蚝油和生抽，加入宽米粉翻炒均匀。
步骤4：将材料推至锅边，打入鸡蛋炒散后用米粉盖住，再加入芥蓝快速翻炒，略带锅气。
步骤5：趁热上桌，可搭配醋泡辣椒、辣椒粉、鱼露和糖调味。
tags: pad see ew, thai stir-fried noodles, soy sauce noodles, street food

dish_en_th: Khao Rad Na Gai (ข้าวราดหน้าไก่)
dish_en: Khao Rad Na Gai (Thai Chicken with Gravy over Rice)
dish_th: ข้าวราดหน้าไก่
dish_zh: 泰式滑蛋鸡肉盖饭 (Khao Rad Na Gai)
description_en: Khao Rad Na Gai is a comforting Thai dish featuring stir-fried marinated chicken in a rich, savory gravy served over steamed rice. It's often accompanied by fried Chinese sausage and fresh vegetables.
description_zh: 泰式滑蛋鸡肉盖饭是一道暖心家常菜，腌制鸡肉搭配浓郁酱汁浇在米饭上，常配炸香肠和新鲜蔬菜一起食用，风味丰富。
ingredients_en: Fried Chinese sausage, sliced thin 5 pieces
Sliced green and red chili, spring onions, cucumber (for serving)
ingredients_zh: 青红椒圈、葱段、黄瓜片（搭配食用）
instructions_en: Step 1: Marinate the chicken with oyster sauce, light soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, Chinese wine, and pepper. Marinate for at least 15 minutes.
Step 2: Mix cornstarch with water to make a slurry.
Step 3: Render chicken skin in a pan until fat is released.
Step 4: Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry until fragrant. Add marinated chicken and stir-fry until browned.
Step 5: Add Chinese wine, light soy sauce, sweet soy sauce, and salt. Stir to combine.
Step 6: Pour in chicken stock and bring to a boil.
Step 7: Lower heat and stir in cornstarch slurry. Stir until sauce thickens.
Step 8: Serve chicken and sauce over steamed rice with fried Chinese sausage, chili, spring onions, and cucumber.
instructions_zh: 步骤1：将鸡腿肉用蚝油、生抽、糖、芝麻油、料酒、胡椒粉腌制至少15分钟。
步骤2：玉米淀粉加水调匀成水淀粉备用。
步骤3：锅中煎鸡皮出油。
步骤4：加入蒜末、姜末炒香，放入腌制好的鸡肉翻炒至变色。
步骤5：加入料酒、生抽、甜酱油和盐，翻炒均匀。
步骤6：倒入鸡高汤煮沸。
步骤7：转小火，倒入水淀粉搅拌至汤汁浓稠。
步骤8：将鸡肉浇在米饭上，搭配炸香肠、辣椒圈、葱段和黄瓜片一起享用。
tags: khao rad na gai, thai chicken with gravy, chicken rice dish, comfort food, street food, central
